learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): The word lead has more than one meaning. It is also pronounced differently depending ...

p.b: The word lead has more than one meaning. It is also pronounced differently depending on which meaning you use.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which lead means "a soft substance used for making marks."

simpleChoice.p: "Right this way," the host said. "I will lead you to your table."
Hazel sharpened her lead pencil before she began writing her story.
Alice was the lead scorer in her soccer game.
With a home run in the ninth inning, the Tigers took the lead.
